name: Flying Pig Digital
overview: Flying Pig Studio’s Owner, David Bragg has been making films since he was a child. After graduating film school with top honors, David settled in north carolina over 12 years ago to begin a career in the media industry. He has been involved with a wide range of projects over the years, including a Sundance Award-Winning Feature Film, Emmy Nominated TV shows, hundreds of commercials, content for the Bob Moog Foundation to The NASCAR Hall of Fame, networks including SHOWTIME, ESPN, SPEED, CMT, HDNet, and more. He has created loads of web content from independent music projects to corporate clientele, and has received numerous Telly and Addy awards for editing, graphics and visual effects. David’s experience, passion, and relationships with an endless network of media professionals, make flying pig studio an attractive outlet for anyone with a digital media project.

funding_rounds.source_description: Flying Pig Digital to Get $25K in Funding
